message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm! However, $11500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $10500.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $10500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  How about $10750? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy owning this product!

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. However, $11200 is still a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $11000? It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product and our willingness to work together.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $11150. I've already compromised quite a bit, and I need to make sure I'm getting a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though - I'll sell the product to you for $11150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love this product!
